name: In re DESIGNATION OF VICE-CHAIRMAN OF the PENNSYLVANIA LAWYERS FUND FOR CLIENT SECURITY BOARD
name_abbreviation: In re Designation of Vice-chairman of the Pennsylvania Lawyers Fund for Client Security Board

parties: In re DESIGNATION OF VICE-CHAIRMAN OF the PENNSYLVANIA LAWYERS FUND FOR CLIENT SECURITY BOARD.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 13th day of December, 1993, Evans Rose, Jr., Esquire, is hereby designated as Vice-Chairman of the Pennsylvania Lawyers Fund for Client Security Board.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
635 A.2d 1028
In re DESIGNATION OF VICE-CHAIRMAN OF the PENNSYLVANIA LAWYERS FUND FOR CLIENT SECURITY BOARD.
No. 325-H(4). Disciplinary Docket No. 1.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 13, 1993.
